title: GET_STATE_OF_RAYFIRE_MAP_OBJECT
content:
0x899BA936634A322E0xF1B8817A// GetStateOfRayfireMapObject
int GET_STATE_OF_RAYFIRE_MAP_OBJECT(Object object);See SET_STATE_OF_RAYFIRE_MAP_OBJECT to see the different statesGet a destructible object's state. Substract 1 to get the real state. For example, if the object just spawned (state 2), the native will return 3.Old name:  _GET_DES_OBJECT_STATE
